body:
THIS IS IN 35 MINUTES AFTER THIS BEING POSTED

Hello

A mega scrim is where a bunch of people get together and two captains pick between the players. We will probably play on Race For Victory 2 on a 1.8 server. If you are interested in playing, please join the Avicus Teamspeak, poke me, and I will give you further information. 

Thank you.

Tazz
